snippet: A court ruled that it would continue to hold Dmitry V. Firtash, a billionaire with ties to Ukraine’s ousted president, and set bail at $174 million after his arrest on an American warrant.
lead_paragraph: A court ruled that it would continue to hold Dmitry V. Firtash, a billionaire with ties to Ukraine’s ousted president, and set bail at $174 million after his arrest on an American warrant.

headline.main: Austria Holds Ukrainian Pending Extradition Decision
